job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Our client is a large hedge fund that prides themselves as being innovative and offering an environment that breeds uniqueness. Our client is looking to identify a Site Reliability Engineer to live in between systems operations and development by being on the front line in ensuring that the firm’s technology works.

 

What You Will Get:

-Competitive compensation package

-Unique work culture

-Diverse team environment


What You Will Do as a Site Reliability Engineer:

-Design and develop software and reliability into architecture

-Create automated tests, deploy and validate services

-Improve service reliability through DevOps capabilities

-Gather and analyze metrics from systems and applications


What You Will Need as a Site Reliability Engineer:

-BS degree in Computer Science or related field preferred

-3+ year(s) working with cloud providers like AWS, Azure and Google Cloud Platform

-Experience with Ansible, Terraform, Chef, RunDeck and other similar technologies

-Knowledge of systems and platforms such as Unix/Linux

 

Our client is not offering relocation packages.

Our client is unable to transfer or sponsor visas at this time.
